title: Turkey: nation in transition
creator_credit: Julien Bryan, International Film Foundation and Leroy Leatherman
brief_description: Introductory animation reviews the history of Turkey and the Middle East from earliest civilization to the twentieth century. Documentary footage shows life in Turkey today, its political and economic problems and its development as a modern nation with democratic institutions.
creator_credit_for_label: Julien Bryan, International Film Foundation and Leroy Leatherman
description: Introductory animation reviews the history of Turkey and the Middle East from earliest civilization to the twentieth century. Documentary footage shows life in Turkey today, its political and economic problems and its development as a modern nation with democratic institutions.
